00055 template <class DataConfig, class ActMechConfig>
00056 class NeuronFactoryHelper
00057         : public AbstractFactory<NeuronInterface>
00058 {
00060     typedef typename NeuronTypeMap < typename DataConfig::related_component
00061     , typename ActMechConfig::related_component
00062     >::created_type
00063     type_to_create;
00064 
00066 
00068     template <class TypeToCreate>
00069     struct TypeConstructor {
00070         static NeuronInterface * const create_impl(DataConfig * const data_cfg, ActMechConfig * const act_mech_cfg) {
00071             return new TypeToCreate(data_cfg, act_mech_cfg);
00072         }
00073     };
00074 
00075 public:
00077 
00080     NeuronFactoryHelper(DataConfig * const data_cfg, ActMechConfig * const act_mech_cfg) : data_cfg_(data_cfg), act_mech_cfg_(act_mech_cfg) {}
00081 
00083     NeuronInterface * const create() {
00084         return TypeConstructor<type_to_create>::create_impl(data_cfg_, act_mech_cfg_);
00085     }
00086 
00087 private:
00088     DataConfig * const data_cfg_; 
00089     ActMechConfig * const act_mech_cfg_; 
00090 };

00095 template <class Configurator>
00096 struct DispatcherNrn2
00097             : public AbstractVisitor
00098             , public Visitor<IFMechConfig>
00099             , public Visitor<InstantIFMechConfig>
00100             , public Visitor<PoissonMechConfig<ConstantPoissonParameter, FuncIdentity> >
00101             , public Visitor<PoissonMechConfig<ConstantPoissonParameter, FuncSigmoid> >
00102             , public Visitor<PoissonMechConfig<OscillatoryPoissonParameter, FuncIdentity> >
00103             , public Visitor<PoissonMechConfig<OscillatoryPoissonParameter, FuncSigmoid> >
00104             , public Visitor<DeltaCorrInputRef>
00105             , public Visitor<CorrInputRefShiftedCopy>
00106             , public Visitor<ShortTimeCorrInputRef> {
00107     DispatcherNrn2(Configurator * cfg1, NeuronFactory * nrn_fact) : cfg1_(cfg1), nrn_fact_(nrn_fact) {}
00108     void visit(IFMechConfig & cfg2) {
00109         nrn_fact_->concrete_factory_ = new NeuronFactoryHelper<Configurator, IFMechConfig>(cfg1_, & cfg2);
00110     }
00111     void visit(InstantIFMechConfig & cfg2) {
00112         nrn_fact_->concrete_factory_ = new NeuronFactoryHelper<Configurator, InstantIFMechConfig>(cfg1_, & cfg2);
00113     }
00114     void visit(PoissonMechConfig<ConstantPoissonParameter, FuncIdentity> & cfg2)  {
00115         nrn_fact_->concrete_factory_ = new NeuronFactoryHelper<Configurator, PoissonMechConfig<ConstantPoissonParameter, FuncIdentity> >(cfg1_, & cfg2);
00116     }
00117     void visit(PoissonMechConfig<ConstantPoissonParameter, FuncSigmoid> & cfg2) {
00118         nrn_fact_->concrete_factory_ = new NeuronFactoryHelper<Configurator, PoissonMechConfig<ConstantPoissonParameter, FuncSigmoid> >(cfg1_, & cfg2);
00119     }
00120     void visit(PoissonMechConfig<OscillatoryPoissonParameter, FuncIdentity> & cfg2)  {
00121         nrn_fact_->concrete_factory_ = new NeuronFactoryHelper<Configurator, PoissonMechConfig<OscillatoryPoissonParameter, FuncIdentity> >(cfg1_, & cfg2);
00122     }
00123     void visit(PoissonMechConfig<OscillatoryPoissonParameter, FuncSigmoid> & cfg2) {
00124         nrn_fact_->concrete_factory_ = new NeuronFactoryHelper<Configurator, PoissonMechConfig<OscillatoryPoissonParameter, FuncSigmoid> >(cfg1_, & cfg2);
00125     }
00126     void visit(DeltaCorrInputRef & cfg2) {
00127         nrn_fact_->concrete_factory_ = new NeuronFactoryHelper<Configurator, DeltaCorrInputRef>(cfg1_, & cfg2);
00128     }
00129     void visit(CorrInputRefShiftedCopy & cfg2) {
00130         nrn_fact_->concrete_factory_ = new NeuronFactoryHelper<Configurator, CorrInputRefShiftedCopy>(cfg1_, & cfg2);
00131     }
00132     void visit(ShortTimeCorrInputRef & cfg2) {
00133         nrn_fact_->concrete_factory_ = new NeuronFactoryHelper<Configurator, ShortTimeCorrInputRef>(cfg1_, & cfg2);
00134     }
00135     Configurator * cfg1_; // holds memory of real-type (already dispatched) configurator object
00136     NeuronFactory * nrn_fact_;
00137 };

00140 
00141 struct DispatcherNrn1
00142             : public AbstractVisitor
00143             , public Visitor<DataCommonNeuronConfig>
00144             , public Visitor<DataRecordNeuronConfig>
00145             , public Visitor<DataPlastNeuronConfig> {
00146     DispatcherNrn1(ConfigBase * data_cfg, ConfigBase * act_mech_cfg, NeuronFactory * nrn_fact)
00147             : data_cfg_(data_cfg), act_mech_cfg_(act_mech_cfg), nrn_fact_(nrn_fact)  {}
00148     void op() {
00149         data_cfg_->apply_vis(*this);
00150     }
00151     void visit(DataCommonNeuronConfig & cfg) {
00152         DispatcherNrn2<DataCommonNeuronConfig> dips2(&cfg, nrn_fact_);
00153         act_mech_cfg_->apply_vis(dips2);
00154     }
00155     void visit(DataRecordNeuronConfig & cfg) {
00156         DispatcherNrn2<DataRecordNeuronConfig> dips2(&cfg, nrn_fact_);
00157         act_mech_cfg_->apply_vis(dips2);
00158     }
00159     void visit(DataPlastNeuronConfig & cfg) {
00160         DispatcherNrn2<DataPlastNeuronConfig> dips2(&cfg, nrn_fact_);
00161         act_mech_cfg_->apply_vis(dips2);
00162     }
00163     ConfigBase * data_cfg_, * act_mech_cfg_;
00164     NeuronFactory * nrn_fact_;
00165 };

00172 // inline definitions
00174 
00176 // NeuronFactory constructor
00177 inline NeuronFactory::NeuronFactory(ConfigBase * const data_cfg, ConfigBase * const act_mech_cfg)
00178 {
00179     DispatcherNrn1 disp(data_cfg, act_mech_cfg, this);
00180     disp.op();
00181 }
00182 
00184 // create method
00185 // calls the method create_impl with the real types of the configurators
00186 // and returns a pointer to the newly created object
00187 inline NeuronInterface * const NeuronFactory::create()
00188 {
00189     // returns a pointer to the newly created neuron
00190     return concrete_factory_->create();
00191 }
